msbt.message: Hey, ! Glad you came by. It's been real, but I've finally decided it's time to move on.Thanks a bunch for the advice the other day. It really meant a lot.Um, I wish I could leave you with a smile, butyeah, I'm really gonna miss you, .Don't forget me, alright?

! You here to see me off? I'm shipping out on a new adventure tomorrow.I'm glad we spoke the other day. It really helped me figure things out, y'know?Anyway, thanks for all the rockin' times we had. I won't forget 'em! Or you, !

Hey, ! Thanks for stopping by! So, if the boxes don't make it obviousI'm moving out!I gotta thank you for your advice the other day. It really helped me get my head straight. Thanks, !I'm so glad we got to party together. I hope we'll be able to rock again someday. Stay awesome, alright?

Hey, ! Glad I caught you! I haven't had a chance to tell you, but I'm moving out.Yep! 's gonna be way less awesome startin' tomorrow. Kinda hard to believe!Anyway, it was super rad getting to know you, . Make sure the others misbehave, alright?

Do I know you? Pretty sure I don't What's up? I'm ! Pleased to meet you!Well, your timing's awful. I woulda loved to get to know you, but I'm moving out today!Oh well! I leave 's fate in your hands, . Keep it awesome, alright?

Well if it ain't ! Whatcha doing here? How you been?I'm actually packing up to move, so I hope you'll cut me a little slack on the mess, .But yeah, I'm kicking myself out of ! Still gotta pick where I'm headed though
Come live on my island!
Best of luck!

Well, if it ain't . You didn't come out here to visit little ol' me, didja?'CauseI don't think you could've picked a worse time. I'm kinda packin' up to move right now.But if you wanna hang out, I'm not gonna stop you. I'm just gonna be REALLY boring, .

You're not from here, are you? My name's ! How's it going?Sorry about the mess. I'm moving tomorrow, so it's kind of a disaster in here, .Actually, if you don't mind, I gotta get back to this. AND figure out where I'm moving to. Ugh
Ha! Thanks a bunch! I really gotta up my planning game
I finally made up my mind! I'm moving to !But do you wanna hear something even MORE exciting? My packing's almost done! Woo!
Hard to believe I'm leaving all this behind. Are you gonna see me off, ? You better!
I never, EVER thought we'd live on the same island again! You ready to re-rock the neighbor life?
Well, I'm gonna be your neighbor tomorrow! You ready for this?I'm counting on you to introduce me to everyone on , especially the cool ones!
Ever been to ? Is it awesome? I'm moving there soon, so I wanna get the inside scoop!
Everything I own is in these boxes. I have absolutely no idea what's in WHICH boxbut it's all there.
was such a blast. And even when it wasn't, everyone was fun to chill with anyway!
I was gonna clean the place before I left, but I heard they're just gonna tear it down, so why bother?
FINALLY done packing! Of course, now I gotta figure out where I'm moving to, .Score one for poor planning!
Wanna be my neighbor?
Well, good luck with that!
Ha! You REALLY wanna put up with me again? I'll call Resident Services on . Let's do this!
Huh? Well, it's not like I've got anything better lined up Could be fun, plus you seem pretty coolAlright, I'm in! What's the number for Resident Services on ?
Yeah, I wanna live somewhere cool, y'know? But how do you find out where's cool before you live there?Except now I'm outta time. Guess I'll just throw a dart at a map and hope for the best, !

Well, I talked to Resident Services. Guess who's gonna be your neighbor? This gal!Thanks for the tip. That's a huge weight off my shoulders. Whew!So, you ready to partyNEIGHBOR? Bwa ha ha! This is gonna rock!

I guess is SUPER popular.I called the Resident Services there, but they said they were full! How can an ENTIRE island be full? Is the plaza like some kind of never- ending mosh pit or something?Well, my moshing days are behind me. If 's THAT full, I'll pass. Thanks, but no thanks!

So, I just got off the phone with Resident Services on Yeah, it's not gonna work out.They said something about there not being enough room for me to have my own place there, .They DID tell me I could move in with someone, but I'm kinda over the whole "having roommates" thing.It's too bad. I was kinda liking the idea of living on . Oh well. Thanks, anyway!
Wow! must be packed! They're not letting anyone else in right now, .
Was there, like, a building boom on ? They said there's no room left to build on!
You know what? Maybe I just caught 'em at a weird time. We were kinda talking past each other.I'll call Resident Services again.
Yeah, do it!
Nah, don't bother.
No? Uh, alright. Scratch that, I guess.No for me, then. Oh well! That's just the way the cookie crumbles sometimes.
